Counter-Strike 1.6 Energy Edition Persian

o Play Online and LAN without any problem
o Based off Counter-Strike 1.6 V23, !!! THE BEST VERSION OF 1.6 OUT THERE !!!
o Includes 94 maps
o CS-DM 2.1, Fun scripts and AMX Mod X 1.8.1
o Counter-Strike Source Player Models
o Counter-Strike Source Weapon World Models
o Custom Weapon View Models ported from Counter-Strike Source
o Custom maps with bot navs already generated
o Custom weapon and player sounds
o Funny and bloody death sounds taken from Blackshot (Average shooter, full of bugs, open beta coming soon)
o Improved decals (muzzleflashes, blood stains, weapon shots)
o Detail textures generated for most maps
o Includes the latest version of the Counter-Strike bot (ZBOT)


What's new? 
- Cleaned some stuff (overviews and sounds) and decreased the size by 200MB
- New maps
- Weapon Re-Origin Mod Demo
- New weapon sounds
- New decals and sprites
- CSDM comes disabled as requested
- New and fully working installer
- CD-Key is registered automatically
